Topic.Title: Will the new Quest be hard to learn?

Posts.EditableText: How much learning will be involved in going to the new 4.0 version of Quest? I am in the process of learning the current version, and I don't want to do all this work only to have to start again!

Posts.EditableText:
I don't think there's going to be much 'change' to 4.0.

But I'll let Alex say how much different it is.

Posts.EditableText:
Quest 4.0 will be much like Quest 3.x in the way it fundamentally works, so there won't be much re-learning of the basic stuff.

It will include a tutorial which should make learning it much easier.

I wouldn't hold off trying to learn Quest 3.x though, as the new version won't be available for several months.
